data.name: RoomEntryPhrases
data.value: You step cautiously into the next chamber... You tiptoe in - no time to dilly dally. You stride inside - no shilly-shally. You sneak through the doorway, hush-hush. You slide into the room, quick as a flick. You saunter in without a fuss or muss. You slink in, slick as a shadow. You meander in - clickety-clack go your boots. You hop in with a skip and a step. You shuffle in - steady and ready. You barrel in - whoops-a-daisy! You creep in, sneaky-beaky. You glide in like a whisper in the dark. You poke your head in - peeky-peek. You slip inside - hocus pocus. You enter - no dilly dally, tally-ho!
